data.name: BURNT ASHES
data.detailed_description:
for any one how played or will play burnt ashes wait until the up comig update



Burnt Ashes is a 3D first-person game in the search and horror genre.

You are a prisoner trying to escape from prison after you have fallen into a coma,

Your job in the prison is to find a tool to open the prison door and then escape from the island
by the boat ... and then your adventure will start . you have to search , collect , escape and solve puzzles to open the gates and fall into an unknown fate . everything has a meaning , don't miss any detail

note :

if you leave in the middle of the level , all your progress will deleted and you have to finish the level before you can access to the next level

data.short_description: Burning Ashes is a 3D first-person game in the search and horror genre. You are a prisoner trying to escape from prison after you have fallen into a coma, Your job in the prison is to find a tool to open the prison door and then escape from the island After escaping from the island by boat ...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32bit
  • Processor: core i5 3470
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 1030 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: core i3 9100f or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti 2gb or Radeon R7 370 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
